item.title: Has Apple lost it?
item.description:
Apple announced the iPhone 5 today and updates to the iPod line. Most of the announcements were lackluster at best, but the event laid the groundwork for the rumored iPad mini event in October, which could be even more disastrous than the iPhone 5 event today.

The iPhone 5 is …
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins

item.title: Look out, there's a new tablet in town and it's HOT!
item.description:
Announcing the Kindle Fire

Amazon announced a few new Kindles today, the most important, in my mind, is the Kindle Fire. It is a 7" tablet running a specialized version of Android. The shocker was the price, \$199. With todays announcement, every school district that is looking at mobile devices …

item.title: The $99 mobile Internet Device
item.description:
Nvidia Plans To Power \$99 Mobile Internet Devices

Nvidia has announced that it plans to power \$99 mobile internet devices with its Tegra 600 series chips, perhaps as early as this summer.

If they can get an Android version released at \$99 that is something that could be a game …
